revised_title: The Evolution of Charles Darwin's Species Theory
tldr: This article reviews the development of Charles Darwin's species theory through his correspondence during the years leading up to the publication of 'On the Origin of Species.' It highlights the extensive communications network Darwin established for gathering information relevant to his work and his debates with fellow scientists on the details of his theory. The article also discusses Darwin's personal life and scientific achievements during this period.
